forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 60, with temperatures falling to around 57 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 9 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain after 11pm. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 51. South southwest wind 7 to 12 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph. Chance of precipitation is 90%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

weather_report:
The afternoon sky in Downtown San Francisco reveals a comforting clarity, a gentle sun bathing the streets in a soft warmth, though the temperature hints at a chill beneath the surface. As the hours slip away, the highs will mellow, falling to a cool embrace, while wind whispers through the bustling city, echoing the promise of changing tides. With the sun making a brief exit, a dramatic swoon into evening nears, a rain that will veil the skyline after dark. The clouds, already gathering their sumptuous plushness, portend a 90% chance of precipitation later tonight, bringing with them the soothing rhythm of raindrops against pavement.

Dress in layers, soft knits and cozy jackets are prudent as the delightful day surrenders to the cooler embrace of dusk. An umbrella may be wise company come nightfall, but for now, a leisurely stroll along the waterfront beckons. Perhaps indulge in a quiet moment at a café, sipping a warm drink while watching the city pulse with life, as evening hints at its arrival through the gathering clouds. The day whispers tales of serenity wrapped in a simple, inviting charm.
